chunks.cleaned_english_translation:
<speak>
If you translate my little work into Greek (as you promise) and wish to make even the most learned witnesses to my ignorance, I will say to you that Horatian phrase: Do not carry wood into the forest
</speak>
chunks.original_latin:
QUOD OPUSCULUM MEUM, SI IN GRAECUM (UT POLLICERIS)
TRANSTULERIS, ET IMPERITIAE MEAE DOCTISSIMOS QUOQUE TESTES
FACERE VOLUERIS, DICAM TIBI ILLUD HORATIANUM: IN SILVAM
NE LIGNA FERAS, etc.
